summary: In summary, the customer was trying to figure out their account with Contoso Wireless and the agent was able to help them set up an account. The agent also provided information about the different data plans available for their TV service, as well as other services such as streaming and home security systems that can be added on to their plan. The customer expressed interest in the streaming service and the agent explained how they could add it to their current plan without needing a separate subscription.
